title: Companies See an Opening for Office Reopening
sub_head: With Omicron cases falling, Citi, American Express, Cisco Systems and others say they spot a window to bring workers back together
body:
The office return is in motion.
After two years of remote work, companies including American Express Co. , Facebook parent Meta Platforms Inc. and Wells Fargo & Co. plan broader office reopenings in March. Many executives say they are uncertain about what the future may hold, but feel confident that offices can at least reopen this month as Omicron cases fall and health authorities loosen mask guidance.
